channel.title: How to make Shops
channel.description: lmao i followed a tut for this, But it doesnt work, I got autospawn to work for the npc though. i used wise old man, And i did the client.Java thing, where you haft to change IP, and the :20 to whatever shop number it is, Then i went to shops and added equipment. I run + Compile, And I see the wise old man, But lmao i cant trade him... When i do, Nothing HAPPENS! Help. And if you do you will get a free mod spot on my server if you want! Just type 111 after you post to accept the mod spot. AND YOU WILL SEE LINK TO MY SERVER ON MY SIG.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 12:29:57 PM[/size][hr]someone can help?

item.description:

I got the same problem, and from what I can tell (NO ONE IS FRICKING AWNSERING MY QUESTION EITHER!) you have to use an NPC with a trade function already there. Use NPC 520-603 or somewhere around there…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 01:46:09 PM[/size][hr]Does that help 'ya bud?

item.title: How to make Shops
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

well u might of did it wrong on adding the whole code… i would though compile and then rune server, not use the run+compile because that might not compile all… u must have to compile first before running or it may not work… and if this is the problem, i do not need a mod position, i help people for free
